# Learning objectives

.font150[
* Become familiar with recent theories about the causes and consequences of political violence 
]
--
.font150[
* Learn how to write referee reports
]
--
.font150[
* Improve your presentation skills and receive real-time feedback like in an academic conference
]
--
.font150[
* Write a term paper that can potentially become an academic article
]
--
.font150[
* .orange[Have interesting and thought-provoking discussions with your colleagues]
]
---

# Grading

.font150[
* **Participation**: 15%
  - Ask questions, bring suggestions, help your colleagues if you know how

* **Three referee reports**: 45%
  - About 5 pages long, one per section of the course (civil wars, genocide, terrorism)

* **Final project**: 40%
  - 15-20 pages, any topic, groups of 3, presentation in the last week
]
